See My Latest Projects.

Full Stack Development: Professional Networking Website [ClickMe]

Duration: June, 2018 - Present

  • Application similar to LinkedIn, which allows business people and professionals, regardless of their industry, to connect with other professionals.
  • People can interact with each other and maintain their profile.
  • Technologies: React, Redux for the frontend; NodeJS, MongoDb for the backend; and hosted on Heroku

    • View Project

    Image Captioning (Python)

    Duration: March, 2018 - May, 2018

  • Generated captions for images using three techniques: Attention-based Model, CNN-RNN and CNN-BRNN.
  • Analysed which algorithm give the best results. Also improved the quality of the captions generated.
  • Dataset Used: Flikr8k, Flikr30k and MSCOCO.

    • View Project

    Airbnb Data Analysis (Python)

    Duration: April, 2018 - May, 2018

  • Analyzed the factors that would enable Airbnb hosts to profit the most from their listings.
  • Made suggesions which would allow the Airbnb guests to make wise decisions regarding which listings to book and when to book them.
  • Techniques used were Parametric and Non-parametric inference, Hypothesis Testing, Linear Regression, Time-series analysis and Bayesian Inference.

    • View Project

    Eber- Booking a Cab using Block-chain (React, Solidity, NodeJS, Ethereum )

    Duration: Jan, 2018 - May, 2018

  • Developed an uber-like mobile application used to make transactions over block-chain. 
  • Replaces the traditional payment methods like Master Card or VISA cards. 
  • Created a smart contract using Solidity and My Ether Wallet to work on block-chain.

    • View Project Slides

    Pacman Game (Python)

    Duration: Sept, 2017 - Dec, 2017

  • Inferred location of ghosts using Bayesian Network and Graph traversing algorithms like Astar, and UCS.
  • Implemented Adversarial Search algorithms like MiniMax, Alpha-Beta Pruning and ExpectiMax Algorithms.

    • View Project

    Hand Gesturing Recognition using OpenCV(Python, Android)

    Duration: 2015 - 2016

  • Developed an Android Application for hearing impaired people that converts hand gestures to voice and text messages.
  • Used SVM for identifying and classifying the images. 
  • Presented this project at Avishkar Research Convention -District Level.
